original: dril bu la lan bdun sngags te gang gis sa phyogs su dkrol ba dang / bya dang / gcan gzan dang / srin bu dang / byi ba dang / rims nad thams cad bsrungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dril bu la lan bdun sngags te gang gis sa phyogs su dkrol ba dang / bya dang / gcan gzan dang / srin bu dang / byi ba dang / rims nad thams cad bsrungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having enchanted a bell seven times, whoever rings it in a certain place, it will be protected from all birds, beasts, insects, mice, and contagious diseases.

original: rims dang / srog chags kyis mi tshugs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: rims dang / srog chags kyis mi tshugs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The Dhāraṇī of Being Not Vulnerable to Contagion and Creatures is complete.
